channel.title: JBoss Issue Tracker
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [ENTESB-3219] Fuse itests have build failure on AIX
item.description:
The fuse itests fail on AIX because of an issue with the aether plugin. Part of the stack trace is shown below. The only information I've been able to find on it is in this post: http://maven.40175.n5.nabble.com/Upgrade-to-3-1-1-causes-problems-td5776875.html#a5777476

I will try replacing the plexus jar file as suggested.

Exception in thread "pool-2-thread-3" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/eclipse/aether/connector/wagon/WagonRepositoryConnector$GetTask

item.summary: Fuse itests have build failure on AIX

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Replacing the plexus jar file resolved the build failure. There are still some itest failures here, but I will revisit those after Grzegorz fixed ENTESB-3826 and ENTESB-3827
